Derivatives¶

This section cover derivatives and it’s notations.

Prime¶

The derivative of a function f at a number a, denoted by f′a, is f′<

When you click on it the operation will be done if possible.

Demo

A demo of the basic arithmetic operation is available.

Del symbol¶

dfdx
